name: Scooby Doo Adventure 6
description:
Ruhh rohh! Shaggy has gotten himself in trouble with the mafia again, will you help him hunt down the mesterious cave troll? Or do something more productive with your free time? ONLY YOU CAN DECIDE!

Beautiful jams can be accessed for your listening pleasure on this lovely gentleman's page: https://soundcloud.com/user-148500860/sets/scooby-doo-adventures-6-ost
